metadata.title: CVE-2024-46825 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: iwlwifi: mvm: use IWL_FW_CHECK for link ID checkThe lookup function iwl_mvm_rcu_fw_link_id_to_link_conf() isnormally called with input from the firmware, so it should useIWL_FW_CHECK() instead of WARN_ON().

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
